005
006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema;
007
008import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IConfiguration;
009import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.configuration.IMutableConfiguration;
010import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.AbstractModuleLoader;
011import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.IModuleLoader;
012import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.model.MetaschemaException;
013import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.CollectionUtil;
014import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
015import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.IBindingContext;
016import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.DeserializationFeature;
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.io.IBoundLoader;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.IBoundDefinitionModelAssembly;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.binding.metaschema.METASCHEMA;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.binding.metaschema.METASCHEMA.Import;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.databind.model.metaschema.impl.BindingModule;
022
023import java.io.IOException;
024import java.net.URI;
025import java.util.List;
026import java.util.Map;
027import java.util.stream.Collectors;
028
029import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
030
031public class BindingModuleLoader
032    extends AbstractModuleLoader<METASCHEMA, IBindingMetaschemaModule>
033    implements IMutableConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>> {
034
035  @NonNull
036  private final IBindingContext bindingContext;
037  private IBoundLoader loader;
038
039  /**
040   * Construct a new Metaschema loader.
041   *
042   * @param bindingContext
043   *          the Metaschema binding context used to load bound resources
044   */
045  public BindingModuleLoader(@NonNull IBindingContext bindingContext) {
046    this(bindingContext, CollectionUtil.emptyList());
047  }
048
049  /**
050   * Construct a new Metaschema loader, which use the provided module post
051   * processors when loading a module.
052   *
053   * @param bindingContext
054   *          the Metaschema binding context used to load bound resources
055   * @param modulePostProcessors
056   *          post processors to perform additional module customization when
057   *          loading
058   */
059  public BindingModuleLoader(
060      @NonNull IBindingContext bindingContext,
061      @NonNull List<IModuleLoader.IModulePostProcessor> modulePostProcessors) {
062    super(modulePostProcessors);
063    this.bindingContext = bindingContext;
064  }
065
066  @Override
067  protected IBindingMetaschemaModule newModule(
068      URI resource,
069      METASCHEMA binding,
070      List<? extends IBindingMetaschemaModule> importedModules)
071      throws MetaschemaException {
072    return new BindingModule(
073        resource,
074        ObjectUtils.notNull(
075            (IBoundDefinitionModelAssembly) getLoader().getBindingContext()
076                .getBoundDefinitionForClass(METASCHEMA.class)),
077        binding,
078        importedModules);
079  }
080
081  @Override
082  protected List<URI> getImports(METASCHEMA binding) {
083    return ObjectUtils.notNull(binding.getImports().stream()
084        .map(Import::getHref)
085        .collect(Collectors.toUnmodifiableList()));
086  }
087
088  @Override
089  protected METASCHEMA parseModule(URI resource) throws IOException {
090    return getLoader().load(METASCHEMA.class, resource);
091  }
092
093  protected IBoundLoader getLoader() {
094    synchronized (this) {
095      if (this.loader == null) {
096        this.loader = bindingContext.newBoundLoader();
097      }
098      return this.loader;
099    }
100  }
101
102  @Override
103  public boolean isFeatureEnabled(DeserializationFeature<?> feature) {
104    return getLoader().isFeatureEnabled(feature);
105  }
106
107  @Override
108  public Map<DeserializationFeature<?>, Object> getFeatureValues() {
109    return getLoader().getFeatureValues();
110  }
111
112  @Override
113  public IMutableConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>>
114      applyConfiguration(IConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>> other) {
115    return getLoader().applyConfiguration(other);
116  }
117
118  @Override
119  public IMutableConfiguration<DeserializationFeature<?>> set(DeserializationFeature<?> feature, Object value) {
120    return getLoader().set(feature, value);
121  }
122
123  public void allowEntityResolution() {
124    enableFeature(DeserializationFeature.DESERIALIZE_XML_ALLOW_ENTITY_RESOLUTION);
125  }
126}
